org.apache.reef.wake.remote.transport

Interface Transport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Stage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyMessagingTransport

    public interface Transport
extends Stage
    Transport for sending and receiving data

    • Method Summary

      <T> Link<T> get(SocketAddress remoteAddr)
      Returns a link for the remote address if already cached; otherwise, returns null

      Returns a link for the remote address if cached; otherwise opens, caches and returns When it opens a link for the remote address, only one attempt for the address is made at a given time

      • open

        <T> Link<T> open(SocketAddress remoteAddr,
               Encoder<? super T> encoder,
               LinkListener<? super T> listener)
             throws IOException
        Returns a link for the remote address if cached; otherwise opens, caches and returns When it opens a link for the remote address, only one attempt for the address is made at a given time
        Parameters:
        remoteAddr - the remote socket address
        encoder - the encoder
        listener - the link listener
        Returns:
        a link associated with the address
        Throws:
        IOException
